Title: The Machinist
Overview: Trevor, an insomniac lathe operator, experiences unusual occurrences at work and home. A strange man follows him everywhere, but no one else seems to notice him.
Tagline: How do you wake up from a nightmare if you’re not asleep?
Keywords: factory, insomnia, post it, machinist, cleaning bathroom tile, osha, taunting, manhole, one armed man, torment, department of motor vehicles, mother's day, losing weight, old photograph, dostoevsky
production_companies: Filmax Entertainment, Castelao Producciones, Canal+ España, Instituto de la Cinematografía y de las Artes Audiovisuales (ICAA), ICF
Cast: Christian Bale, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Aitana Sánchez-Gijón
